hudmanager.options.Display.tooltip: Whether to show on the screen.
hudmanager.options.ActionBar.tooltip: Locates above the Hotbar, displays various texts.
hudmanager.options.BossBar.tooltip: Locates at the top of screen, displays health of boss mobs.
hudmanager.options.ClosedCaption.tooltip: Locates in the bottom right of screen, displays sounds in game.
hudmanager.options.Crosshair.tooltip: Locates in the middle of screen, displays the aim point.
hudmanager.options.DebugScreen.tooltip: Shown when F3 is pressed, displays various information.
hudmanager.options.HotbarGroup.tooltip: Locates at the bottom of screen, displays various information.
hudmanager.options.PlayerList.tooltip: Shown while holding down Tab, displays player information.
hudmanager.options.Scoreboard.tooltip: Locates on the right of screen, displays objective information.
hudmanager.options.ScreenTitle.tooltip: Locates in the middle of screen, displays various texts.
hudmanager.options.StatusEffect.tooltip: Locates in the top right of screen, displays status effects.
hudmanager.options.ToastMessage.tooltip: Locates in the top right of screen, displays notifications.
hudmanager.options.Tooltip.tooltip: Locates beside mouse cursor, displays various information.
